itemInfo.itemDesc:
The flavors of Serendia put into one dish.
- Unique effect: For 90 min:
 All AP +5
 All Accuracy +10
 Critical Hit Rate +5%
- How to Obtain: It can be cooked at your residence.

item.name: Ham Sandwich
item.desc:
A soft bread with sausage placed inside. 

- Unique Effect: All AP +3 for 90 min
All Accuracy +8 for 90 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Beehive Cookie
item.desc:
Baked grain dough with beehive in it. 
- Unique effect: Weight Limit +50LT for 90 min.
Fishing Speed Rank +1 for 90 min.
- How to Obtain : Can be cooked at your residence.
- Cooldown : 30 min.

item.name: Fruit Wine
item.desc:
Sweet flavored liquor made of fruits. 
- Unique effect: Fishing Speed Rank +1 for 60 min.
- How to Obtain : Can be cooked at your residence.
- Cooldown : 30 min.

item.name: Boiled Bird Eggs
item.desc:
A completely boiled bird egg. 

- Unique Effect: All AP +1 for 30 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Meat Pie
item.desc:
A grain dough baked with meat inside. 

- Unique Effect: Max Stamina +200 for 60 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: High-Quality Ham Sandwich
item.desc:
A sandwich made with high-quality ingredients. 

- Unique Effect: All AP +3 for 110 min
 All Accuracy +8 for 110 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min
